zh-cn: 柴静雾霾调查：穹顶之下 同呼吸 共命运

description.zh-cn: 由媒体人柴静于2015年推出的一部关于中国空气污染的调查纪录片，引发了社会巨大反响，但随后遭到中国官方全面封杀。
description.en: A 2015 documentary film by journalist Chai Jing concerning air pollution in China, which sparked widespread public discussion before being censored by Chinese authorities.

description.zh-cn: 中国媒体人、记者，《穹顶之下》纪录片的制作人、主讲人和调查记者。
description.en: Chinese journalist and media personality, who produced, hosted, and conducted the investigation for the documentary 'Under the Dome'.

description.zh-cn: 《穹顶之下》纪录片的总编导，曾任中国中央电视台《看见》栏目主编。
description.en: The director of the documentary 'Under the Dome', formerly the chief editor of the CCTV program 'Seeing'.

description.zh-cn: 一部由美国前副总统艾尔·高尔主演的关于全球变暖的纪录片，其呈现方式对《穹顶之下》产生了影响。
description.en: A documentary film about global warming featuring former U.S. Vice President Al Gore, whose presentation style influenced 'Under the Dome'.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，曾任副总统，其主演的纪录片《难以忽视的真相》关注全球变暖问题。
description.en: American politician and former Vice President, known for his environmental activism and the documentary 'An Inconvenient Truth'.

description.zh-cn: 中国官方媒体《人民日报》的在线平台，是《穹顶之下》的首播平台之一，后应宣传部门要求将其下架。
description.en: The online platform of the official Chinese newspaper People's Daily. It was one of the initial distributors of 'Under the Dome' before being ordered to remove it.

description.zh-cn: 中国大型视频分享网站，是《穹顶之下》的首播平台之一，后应宣传部门要求将其下架。
description.en: A major Chinese video sharing website that was one of the initial distributors of 'Under the Dome' before being ordered to remove it.

en: Propaganda Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的宣传与意识形态管理机构，据报道在《穹顶之下》发布数日后下令全面封杀该片。
description.en: The propaganda and ideology management body of the Chinese Communist Party, which reportedly ordered a complete ban on 'Under the Dome' several days after its release.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中华人民共和国环境保护部部长，在《穹顶之下》发布后曾对其公开表示赞赏。
description.en: Chinese politician who was the Minister of Environmental Protection at the time of the documentary's release and publicly praised it.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国环境保护部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国环境保护部
en: Ministry of Environmental Protection of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 曾负责中国环境保护工作的国务院组成部门。时任部长陈吉宁曾对《穹顶之下》表示赞赏。
description.en: A former component department of the State Council responsible for environmental protection in China. The minister at the time, Chen Jining, expressed appreciation for 'Under the Dome'.

description.zh-cn: 中国官方通讯社新华社的官方网站，在《穹顶之下》发布后曾发表相关文章，但随后撤稿并删除相关内容。
description.en: The official website of China's state news agency, Xinhua. It published articles related to 'Under the Dome' but later withdrew them and deleted related content.

nodes.id: 中国石油天然气集团公司

zh-cn: 中国石油天然气集团公司

description.zh-cn: 中国大型国有石油和天然气公司，在《穹顶之下》中被点名批评。其高层工程师随后撰文反驳片中观点。
description.en: A major state-owned oil and gas corporation in China, which was criticized by name in 'Under the Dome'. Its senior engineer later wrote an article refuting the film's claims.

nodes.id: 中国石油化工集团公司

zh-cn: 中国石油化工集团公司

description.zh-cn: 中国大型国有石油化工企业集团，在《穹顶之下》中被点名批评，被指阻碍环保政策。
description.en: A major state-owned petrochemical conglomerate in China, which was criticized by name in 'Under the Dome' for allegedly obstructing environmental policies.

description.zh-cn: 指中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会和中国人民政治协商会议的年度例行会议。《穹顶之下》在2015年两会前夕发布，引发了与会代表和委员的热议。
description.en: The annual plenary sessions of the National People's Congress (NPC) and the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC) of the People's Republic of China. 'Under the Dome' was released on the eve of the 2015 Two Sessions and sparked heated discussions among delegates and members.

description.zh-cn: 时任全国工商联环境商会秘书长，高度评价《穹顶之下》，认为其意义不亚于《寂静的春天》。
description.en: Then Secretary-General of the Chamber of Environmental Commerce of the All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce, who highly praised 'Under the Dome', comparing its significance to that of 'Silent Spring'.

description.zh-cn: 由雷切尔·卡森所著的关于农药危害的环境保护书籍，被骆建华用来类比《穹顶之下》的社会意义。
description.en: An environmental science book by Rachel Carson about the harms of pesticides, which was used by Luo Jianhua to draw a parallel to the social significance of 'Under the Dome'.

description.zh-cn: 美国海洋生物学家和作家，其著作《寂静的春天》推动了全球环境保护运动。
description.en: American marine biologist and author whose book 'Silent Spring' advanced the global environmental movement.

en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。在2015年的记者会上，其总理李克强回避了关于《穹顶之下》的提问，且官方文字实录删除了相关内容。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China. At a 2015 press conference, Premier Li Keqiang avoided a question about 'Under the Dome', and the question was omitted from the official transcript.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中国国务院总理。在记者会上被问及《穹顶之下》时回避了直接评价。
description.en: Chinese politician who was the Premier of the State Council of China at the time. When asked about 'Under the Dome' at a press conference, he avoided a direct comment.

description.zh-cn: 科普作家，以学术打假著称。他撰文批评《穹顶之下》，质疑其数据和叙事手法的真实性。
description.en: A popular science writer known for exposing academic misconduct. He wrote an article criticizing 'Under the Dome', questioning the authenticity of its data and narrative.

description.zh-cn: 中国石油天然气集团公司质量与标准管理部副总工程师，撰文反驳《穹顶之下》中对石油行业的批评。
description.en: Deputy Chief Engineer of the Quality and Standards Management Department at CNPC, who wrote an article to refute the criticisms of the petroleum industry made in 'Under the Dome'.

description.zh-cn: 时任山西省环境保护厅厅长，曾在《穹顶之下》中出镜。纪录片发布后不久，他因涉嫌严重违纪违法接受调查。
description.en: Then Director of the Shanxi Provincial Department of Environmental Protection, who appeared in 'Under the Dome'. Shortly after the documentary's release, he was investigated for serious violations of discipline and law.

en: Shanxi Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山西省的纪律检查机关，于2015年3月对时任山西省环保厅厅长刘向东进行调查。
description.en: The disciplinary inspection agency of the Chinese Communist Party in Shanxi Province, which investigated Liu Xiangdong, then Director of the Shanxi Provincial Department of Environmental Protection, in March 2015.

position.zh-cn: 制作人、主讲人、调查记者

description.zh-cn: 柴静自费拍摄并主持了纪录片《穹顶之下》，旨在唤起公众对中国空气污染问题的关注。其个人动机与女儿出生时被查出患有肿瘤以及日益严重的雾霾问题有关。
description.en: Chai Jing self-funded and hosted the documentary 'Under the Dome' to raise public awareness about air pollution in China. Her personal motivation was linked to her daughter being diagnosed with a tumor at birth and the worsening smog problem.

description.zh-cn: 范铭担任《穹顶之下》的总编导。
description.en: Fan Ming served as the director of 'Under the Dome'.

description.zh-cn: 《穹顶之下》在呈现方式上，如演讲、数据展示等，受到了《难以忽视的真相》的显著影响，两者风格类似。
description.en: 'Under the Dome' was significantly influenced by 'An Inconvenient Truth' in its presentation style, including the use of a public speech format and data visualization.

description.zh-cn: 艾尔·高尔是纪录片《难以忽视的真相》的主演和核心推动者。
description.en: Al Gore was the star and central figure driving the documentary 'An Inconvenient Truth'.

description.zh-cn: 人民网作为官方媒体平台，是《穹顶之下》的首播平台之一，并对柴静进行了专访。
description.en: As an official media platform, People's Daily Online was one of the initial distributors of 'Under the Dome' and conducted an exclusive interview with Chai Jing.

description.zh-cn: 优酷网是《穹顶之下》的首播平台之一，为该片的迅速传播提供了渠道。
description.en: Youku was one of the initial distributors of 'Under the Dome', providing a channel for its rapid dissemination.

description.zh-cn: 时任环保部长陈吉宁在影片发布后，通过短信向柴静表示感谢，并公开赞赏该片唤起了公众对环境问题的重视，代表了官方最初的积极态度。
description.en: Then-Minister of Environmental Protection Chen Jining sent a text message to thank Chai Jing after the film's release and publicly praised it for raising public awareness of environmental issues, representing the initial positive official stance.

description.zh-cn: 据多家媒体报道，中共中央宣传部在两会前夕下达指示，要求媒体停止报道《穹顶之下》，并将其从各大网站下架，导致该片被全面封杀。
description.en: According to multiple media reports, the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee issued a directive on the eve of the Two Sessions, ordering media to cease reporting on 'Under the Dome' and to remove it from major websites, leading to a complete ban on the film.

description.zh-cn: 在接到中共中央宣传部的指示后，人民网撤下了《穹顶之下》的视频及所有相关文章。
description.en: After receiving the directive from the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee, People's Daily Online removed the video of 'Under the Dome' and all related articles.

description.zh-cn: 在接到中共中央宣传部的指示后，优酷网下架了《穹顶之下》的视频，并停止了留言功能。
description.en: After receiving the directive from the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee, Youku removed the video of 'Under the Dome' and disabled its comment function.

description.zh-cn: 新华网于3月1日撤下了一篇关于《穹顶之下》引发两会代表关注的文章，是官方态度转变的早期信号之一。
description.en: On March 1, Xinhuanet withdrew an article about 'Under the Dome' drawing attention from Two Sessions delegates, which was one of the early signs of a shift in the official attitude.

relationships.target: 中国石油天然气集团公司

description.zh-cn: 纪录片中点名批评了以中石油为代表的国有企业在能源市场中的垄断地位，及其对推行更严格环保标准构成的阻力。
description.en: The documentary criticized state-owned enterprises, represented by CNPC, for their monopolistic position in the energy market and their resistance to implementing stricter environmental standards.

relationships.target: 中国石油化工集团公司

description.zh-cn: 纪录片中点名批评了以中石化为代表的国有企业，指出其阻碍了环保政策的制定和执行。
description.en: The documentary criticized state-owned enterprises, represented by Sinopec, pointing out their role in obstructing the formulation and implementation of environmental policies.

description.zh-cn: 作为中石油的高层工程师，万战翔撰文对《穹顶之下》提出的批评进行了反驳，为所在企业辩护。
description.en: As a senior engineer at CNPC, Wan Zhanxiang wrote an article to refute the criticisms made in 'Under the Dome' and defend his company.

description.zh-cn: 方舟子撰文质疑《穹顶之下》的科学严谨性，并指责柴静编造其女儿患肿瘤的故事以博取同情。
description.en: Fang Zhouzi wrote an article questioning the scientific rigor of 'Under the Dome' and accused Chai Jing of fabricating the story of her daughter's tumor to gain sympathy.

description.zh-cn: 该纪录片在2015年两会前夕发布，迅速成为社会焦点，并引发了参会的人大代表和政协委员对环境问题的热烈讨论。
description.en: The documentary was released on the eve of the 2015 Two Sessions, quickly becoming a public focus and sparking heated discussions on environmental issues among NPC deputies and CPPCC members.

description.zh-cn: 在十二届全国人大第三次会议的记者会上，时任总理李克强回避了关于《穹顶之下》的提问，并且该提问在官方发布的文字实录中被删除。
description.en: At the press conference for the 3rd Session of the 12th National People's Congress, then-Premier Li Keqiang avoided a question about 'Under the Dome', and the question was deleted from the official published transcript.

description.zh-cn: 全国工商联环境商会秘书长骆建华在评价《穹顶之下》时，将其与《寂静的春天》相提并论，认为其社会意义同样重大。
description.en: Luo Jianhua, Secretary-General of the Chamber of Environmental Commerce, compared 'Under the Dome' to 'Silent Spring' when evaluating it, suggesting its social significance was equally profound.

description.zh-cn: 在《穹顶之下》播出后不久，曾在片中出镜的时任山西省环保厅厅长刘向东因涉嫌严重违纪违法，被山西省纪委立案调查。
description.en: Shortly after 'Under the Dome' was broadcast, Liu Xiangdong, then Director of the Shanxi Provincial Department of Environmental Protection who had appeared in the film, was investigated by the Shanxi Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection for suspected serious violations of discipline and law.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国环境保护部

description.zh-cn: 陈吉宁于2015年2月被任命为中华人民共和国环境保护部部长。
description.en: Chen Jining was appointed as the Minister of Environmental Protection of the People's Republic of China in February 2015.
